content.rendered:
FRESH FLOWERS

All our fresh flower arrangements are individually curated using the finest seasonal flowers and exquisite hues. Just like the uniqueness of every moment, no two are the same!

Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Designer Bouquets

$135.00 – $280.00 incl GST

"Designer Bouquets | White & Pink Roses, Stock, Delphinium | Peach & Lemon Roses, Orchids, Daffodils | Burgundy Roses, Dahlias | Gold Coast Flower Delivery

Signature Posies

$115.00 – $260.00 incl GST

 

Fragrant & Sweet

$85.00 incl GST

Our Fragrant & Sweet collection is tailored for those who adore the soft perfume of fresh cut flowers in their living space. Featuring petite perfumed flower bouquets, highlighting a single seasonal flower variety for full impact. We do not add any additional foliage. We will select the best perfumed flowers, dependent on season. Though typically...

Floral Bowl

$165.00 incl GST

Introducing our Floral Bowl, the sweetest present. A delightful table arrangement featuring a posy of seasonal florals to admire and adorn any tabletop in your living space, accompanied by a designer vase from ‘Marmoset Found‘ Australia. Presented with our signature gift box and trailing ribbon. The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we...

Seasonal En Masse

$75.00 – $95.00 incl GST

Our Seasonal En Masse collection is tailored for the minimalist who appreciates the elegance of simplicity. Featuring a minimalist design, that puts focus on highlights a single seasonal flower variety for full impact. No additional foliage is added. We will select the best seasonal flowers, dependent on season. Though typically consist of  Stock Lisianthus Matricaria...

Send Love & Hugs

$115.00 incl GST

Send Love & Hugs with our delightful seasonal bouquet of fresh flowers and decadent Loco Love chocolates. Whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, or just to show you care, this floral bouquet is the perfect way to express your affection and bring smiles to those you cherish. Each bouquet is carefully curated to highlight the finest...

Dahlias & Loco Love

$75.00 incl GST

Our Dahlias & Loco Love offers a delightful fusion of fine taste and supporting local. Exquisite Dahlias, lovingly grown by our wonderful Dahlia micro grower, nestled in the picturesque scenic rim of Mount Tamborine, paired with artisanal Loco Love chocolates, handmade in the beautiful Byron Bay. We add no additional foliage.  Finished with our signature...

Lux Arrangements

$245.00 – $415.00 incl GST

Our vase arrangements are curated for flower enthusiasts, offering a modern and stylish aesthetic with a contemporary finish. Each vase arrangement is uniquely designed to highlight the finest seasonal florals available in our studio on the day. Luxurious, elegant, refined. Inspired by the beauty of each season, featuring premium flowers thoughtfully selected to reflect the...

Tulips & Loco Love

$95.00 incl GST

Our Tulips bouquet & Loco Love offers a charming blend of fine taste and local support. These elegant Tulips are lovingly nurtured by our dedicated Australian growers, nestled amidst the scenic landscape of Victoria. Paired with artisanal Loco Love chocolates, handmade in the beautiful Byron Bay. We add no additional foliage. Varieties may include both...

Garden Roses & Loco Love

$105.00 incl GST

Our Garden Roses & Loco Love offers a romantic blend of fine taste and local support. Perfumed Garden Roses, lovingly grown by our dedicated micro grower, that grace the Northern NSW region. Paired with artisanal Loco Love chocolates, handmade in the beautiful Byron Bay. We add no additional foliage. Finished with our signature wrap and...

Signature Floral Heart

$175.00 incl GST

Introducing our signature fresh flower heart arrangement, exclusive to LULLY & ROSE. Our flower heart is thoughtfully curated with a selection of dainty fresh florals and berries, adorned with delicate moss detailing, reflecting our heartfelt dedication. It’s the ultimate expression of love, offering a distinctive and romantic way to gift flowers, that embodies both elegance...

Seasonal Availability

Fresh flowers are dependant on the season and availability, as we rely on nature.
Please trust in us, to select the finest seasonal flowers to convey your sentiments. 

We value your trust and look forward to curating something beautiful for you!

Same Day Delivery

Same-day delivery is available for orders placed before 12 noon, unless we have reached capacity or sold out.
Delivery is only available to select Gold Coast suburbs. For further information please see our delivery zones page.

Product Availability

If you would like to place an order for a product currently out of stock, or would like to arrange a delivery outside of our surburb zoning, please call our studio on 0481 810 535 or email us on info@lullyandrose.com.au
